values:
:) Amy helped me make my journal look all spiff!
If you would like to register a complaint, click on the link below!

So my coworker wants me to rip the title pages out of all these reference books and then throw them away... This kind of thing should be a crime... I mean... there are a lot of useless outdated reference books here but the majority of them still contain much to offer... I pocketed a few that I will probably never read but they are interesting and I'd rather have them on my book shelf at home than in a dumpster... This is the kind of thing that makes civilization forget things

message for Amy:
Don't be sick!... well at least I hope that your throat doesn't feel too bad and that you don't get strep... If I don't get to talk to you later then sleep well tonight and be safe...
*BIG HUGS*

OK this time I really found it... I think


Guybrush Threepwood is the man

Woo Hoo! I found it! but now the question is do I want to pay for it? EDIT: I'm an idiot... I just read the availability thing and it's out of stock so I'll have to get it used from some guy who has a CD ROM made out of sand paper

An explosion of color and light in a room filled with smoke... the light subsides but there is just enough to see the smokey hase... no more pretty colors... just smoke... slowly it settles... I begin to make sense of things... I'm in a structure built of logs... in front of me is a door... on the wall to my left there is a small window... I look out of it now and see that the sun is half over it's horizon... but is it rising or setting? Suddenly a second question pops into my head... Who summoned me?... I say it out loud but I'm not entirely sure why... now things start to become clearer... could it be true? have I been given a free ride? have I been brought to this world without any debt to repay? But who in their right mind would summon an Elf and then leave?
